text: Damir Džumhur was the defending champion, but he lost in the second round to Maxime Hamou. Albert Ramos-Viñolas won the title, defeating Alessandro Giannessi in the final, 6–2, 6–4. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw San Benedetto Tennis Cup - Singles 2015 Singles
title: 2015 San Benedetto Tennis Cup – Singles
